attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have just written a letter regarding the cruelty inflicted on Poor Baby P. I feel very strongly about this and the truth is the system let him down, our so called good old British system. He was in the hands of such evil, and did not stand a chance at all. Please give your support in bringing justice for Baby P??

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
